articles.description: A body found in North Carolina has been preliminarily identified as 13-year-old Hania Aguilar, who was kidnapped outside her home, investigators said. Wednesday's development brings a sad conclusion to a three-week search involving hundreds of investigators.

articles.description: Google's just renamed Google Fi mobile service now works on iPhones and most Android phones and offers free roaming in 170 countries. CBS News Technology Consultant Larry Magid has today's "Eye on Tech."

articles.title: Hundreds of strangers honor Vietnam veteran at his burial
articles.description: Vietnam veteran Stanley Stoltz died in Omaha this month. It looked like he would be buried alone, until strangers showed up to honor a man they never met. "CBS Evening News" anchor Jeff Glor explains.
